subtitle: A very basic recipe to make but it can be varied by placing fresh herbs in the diagonal cuts.

method.text: Sprinkle fish lightly inside and out with salt. Leave for 30 min.
Preheat grill. Make 3 diagonal slashes on each side of fish.
Grill for about 5 min each side or until fish flakes easily when tested with fork. Serve hot.

title: Salt grilled red mullet
